name: tm08
effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
